values:
Uncle Steve and his 'girlfriend' Anna are in jail. This leaves all their rat pack in foster care unless Mark, Sharon, Steve and I take them in. I hate Uncle Steve. I hate Anna. I love...their kids. ::chokes back the tears:: One in particular. Ashley. She is so far the only girl in the pack, and she's the oldest. I love her to death. And she could be mine for awhile. Her chance to stay IN SCHOOL. Her chance to be something and maybe I can teach her something with her stay with me... Room? We don't have a lot of room, but we do have a couch and an inflatable mattress. I do have food for them and I do want this except I KNOW without a shadow of a doubt that they will come to get them when they get out and I'll miss Ashley. Oi. I'll take two babies and Ashley. XD I told Steve that I get dibs on Ashley. She is the sweetest girl. We might not though. Steve's against it. Cause he thinks it's a waste of money and they'll get the kids back anyway. I think this is Ashley's chance for something. Update
March 15th 2009 She's mine. We go to court on Monday March 16th 2009 for her parents to lose her for good. She's my baby girl. ^_^
